participant_1.background:
I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
I love food that is fresh and flavorful, especially if it's locally sourced.
since i have fibromyalgia , the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me.
I enjoy crocheting in my spare time.
My business is growing, so I spend my days meeting with clients, booking venues, and coordinating vendors.

participant_2.background:
I am in good health and I take care of myself.
I spend my day learning about personal finance and investing while watching Star Wars.
I cherish my cello.
my parents are in there 80 s.
i drive a mercedes.

content.text: Hey! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I am well too, thanks! I'm looking forward to a busy week ahead.
Oh, what do you have planned?
I have a lot of meetings with clients and I need to start practicing for choir.
That sounds like a lot of work, but it is also sounds rewarding!
It is! I love my job and I am excited to be a part of the choir.
Oh, that is so cool! I have always wanted to plan a wedding.
It is a lot of work, but it is very rewarding.
I bet it is! I imagine you get to meet all sorts of interesting people.
I do! I also get to see a lot of beautiful places.
